name: Caterpie
flavorText:
Its short feet are tipped with suction
pads that enable it to tirelessly climb
slopes and walls.

previous.name: Blastoise
previous.flavorText:
A brutal POKéMON
with pressurized
water jets on its shell. They are
used for high
speed tackles.

next.name: Metapod
next.flavorText:
This POKéMON is
vulnerable to
attack while its shell is soft,
exposing its weak
and tender body.

pokemon.name: Butterfree
pokemon.flavorText:
In battle, it
flaps its wings
at high speed to release highly
toxic dust into
the air.
